issue.title: google.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [google.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=google.com) ### Comment > If you don’t disable the content blocker on the webpage, Google Shopping results will continue to be blocked and won’t display anything. It seems like you’ll need to either disable the content blocker entirely or create an exception rule for this ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/m2cczopissgw8o48gw848wws8ks0g4bvi6cji4zjsw.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
Shown section not shown on freshly registered account.
@asarnacki
Please try to disable DNS protection and Stealth module and check again.
If you can still reproduce then, I need instructions how to get that shown section where it breaks.
